attributes.action: Petition for his Majesty the king to dissolve parliament. New general election.
attributes.additional_details: To actually discuss a new general election, for Starmer   to actually take accountability. Listen to the people and to put this very petition in front of the king. VOTE OF NO CONFIDENCE.
attributes.background: I want the government to put forward a petition to the king to dissolve this disastrous parliament. On so many occasions Reeves and Starmer have gone back on what they said they were going to do, loosing the people’s trust. Starmer has had 1 year to make change and it’s getting worse. Not a leader.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727309
